uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.jdbc.expr

Class BinarySQLValue

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.jdbc.expr.BinarySQLValue
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GroupingSQLValue<java.lang.Number>, SQLValue<java.lang.Number>, Targetted<java.lang.Number>

    public class BinarySQLValue
extends java.lang.Object
implements GroupingSQLValue<java.lang.Number>
    a numerical binary SQLValue. Normally BinaryExpressions should be used in preference but this is needed if the arguments are SQLValues but not SQLExpressions
    Author:
    spb
    See Also:
    BinaryExpression
